title: Lollipop Watch Face
summary: Lollipop watch face perfect for round and square watches!
description: Lollipop watch face perfect for round and square watches!Features and settings:✔ 7 lollipop presets to get your watch more beautiful✔ Background hypnotize rotation✔ Rotation speed(slow, average, fast)✔ Rotation direction(clockwise, counterclockwise)✔ Works for round and square watches✔ Optional digital clock (24 hour or 12 hour)✔ Weather indicator, Celsius or Fahrenheit✔ Weather icons✔ Weather update interval✔ Multiple time zones✔ Date indicatorNotice: all settings are accessible via Android Wear Application on the phone, select "Lollipop Watch Face" and click a "gear icon" on it.To install the watch face1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose "Lollipop Watch Face" as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app.
descriptionHTML:
Lollipop watch face perfect for round and square watches!

Features and settings:
✔ 7 lollipop presets to get your watch more beautiful
✔ Background hypnotize rotation
✔ Rotation speed(slow, average, fast)
✔ Rotation direction(clockwise, counterclockwise)
✔ Works for round and square watches
✔ Optional digital clock (24 hour or 12 hour)
✔ Weather indicator, Celsius or Fahrenheit
✔ Weather icons
✔ Weather update interval
✔ Multiple time zones
✔ Date indicator

Notice: all settings are accessible via Android Wear Application on the phone, select "Lollipop Watch Face" and click a "gear icon" on it.

To install the watch face
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose "Lollipop Watch Face" as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app.
